# `ConversationFormPage` Definition

Form page object.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Text to show in the title. |
| subtitle | `string` | Yes | Text to show in the subtitle. |
| pageComponents | [`ConversationFormPageComponent[]`](conversationformpagecomponent-definition.md) | No | Page components in this form page. |
